channel.title: 3, Perhaps Large, Questions
channel.description:
1. User permissions - How do I set them, and how can I check my current permission level?
2. Prayer - Is there any way to make protect prayers (range/mage/melee) workable?
3. Walking through walls/objects - All NPCs seem to do this...... can I stop it?
I am using Project 16 as the basis of my server if that helps at all......
And I have spent a good lot of this afternoon/evening attempting to find solutions before posting to ask, so any suggestions? :$
Thanks,
~ao

Any chance you can point me to a more specific point instead of the whole topic?
